sentence: I’m a boots-on-the-ground, actual cop.” As McCarthy and his allies weigh Katko’s successor on the committee, they can look to one prominent example of a Freedom Caucus member who came into their fold: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio), a co-founder of the famously combative group.
title: Freedom Caucus members square off for a plum post with all eyes on McCarthy

sentence: I’m a boots-on-the-ground, actual cop.” As McCarthy and his allies weigh Katko’s successor on the committee, they can look to one prominent example of a Freedom Caucus member who came into their fold: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio), a co-founder of the famously combative group.
title: Freedom Caucus members square off for a plum post with all eyes on McCarthy

sentence: Pelosi did not object to Nehls, but McCarthy pulled all of his nominees when Pelosi rejected Reps. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, and Jim Banks, R-Ind., because they had worked to defend Trump on the House Judiciary Committee during House Democrat-led impeachment inquiries.
author: Eric Mack
title: Trump Endorses Texas GOP Reps. Nehls, Gooden, Weber
